Description: Create a new list where saved restaurants are stored.
Edit the name or description of an existing list.
Delete an existing list, all saved restaurants from that list is also deleted.
Add a restaurant into an existing list.
Remove a restaurant from an existing list.
Create a reservation/booking for a restaurant table. Use this policy when neither number of guests or date of the reservation is specified, otherwise use the create_reservation_with_limit policy.
Create a reservation/booking for a restaurant table, if only reservation is for ${number_of_guests} guests and the date of the reservation is at ${date_of_reservation}.
Args: {"number_of_guests": {"type": "number", "description": "The number of guests for the reservation"}, "date_of_reservation": {"type": "string", "description": "The date of the reservation in YYYY-MM-DD format"}}

Description: Modify details of an existing reservation/booking.
Cancel or delete an existing reservation/booking.
Submit a new rating or written review for a restaurant.
Submit a new rating or written review for a properties, experiences, or services, where the rating must be exactly ${number_of_stars} stars.
Args: {"number_of_stars": {"type": "number", "description": "The exact number of stars for the review"}}

Description: Modify user account preferences or notification settings.
Set up notifications or alerts for when there is a new table opening.
